content.rendered:
Cancer Care Program

Book Free Consultation

Program Description

Our Cancer Nutrition Program is intended to help cancer patients who are undergoing treatment, including radiation therapy, as well as to improve quality of life after treatment. Our programme is based on the principles of nutrition care process, in which each diet plan is tailored to the individual’s unique biochemistry, medical needs, and cancer treatment goals, while also addressing side effects such as nausea, fatigue, and loss of appetite. This programme is designed to assist cancer patients in maintaining a healthy weight, improving immune function, and reducing inflammation, all of which can improve treatment outcomes and quality of life. With our Cancer Nutrition Program, patients can feel empowered to take control of their nutrition and overall health during and after cancer treatment.

Key Benefits of
this Program

Improved immune function:
Proper nutrition can help to boost the immune system, which is essential for fighting cancer cells and reducing the risk of cancer recurrence. A diet rich in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins can provide the nutrients needed for optimal immune function.

Improved quality of life after treatment:
Proper nutrition can help to improve quality of life after cancer treatment by promoting overall health and wellness. A healthy diet can help to reduce the risk of other health conditions, such as heart disease and diabetes, which are more common in cancer survivors. It can also help to improve energy levels and reduce fatigue, leading to a better overall quality of life.
Reduced treatment-related side effects:
Radiation therapy and chemotherapy can cause a range of side effects, including nausea, fatigue, and loss of appetite. Proper nutrition can help to manage these side effects by providing the necessary nutrients to support the body during treatment.

Price and package
details for program

Pakage Variation

Please note that program prices may vary depending on the type and severity of cancer, as well as other coexisting medical conditions, and the type and frequency of counselling and support needed.

Total Costing & Duration

Starting prices – INR 72,000

Duration – 3 Months

Read Success Stories
from Our Client

Book Free Consultation

@graph.name: Cancer Care, Cancer patient diet Program - Echha Joshi
@graph.description: Our Cancer Nutrition Program is intended to help cancer patients who are undergoing treatment, including radiation therapy. We help in oncology nutrition.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
